name: Senior Test Engineer / QA Analyst
description:
ARRIVAL is a technology company making vehicles the way they should be - fully electric, digitally connected, and smart. By creating innovation in vehicle design and manufacturing, Arrival is accelerating autonomous and electric vehicle technology, by fusing AI with new forms of automotive engineering. We are working with some of the world's leading businesses and governments with the goal to re-define how cities look, think and feel. Our vehicles will be 100% built by robots within our microfactories globally. We are recognised by LinkedIn as 2020’s number 1 start-up in the UK for as well as being one the world’s newest Unicorns with a £5 billion valuation.

The Senior Test Engineer role is open for the new team ensuring quality of business systems implementation. We need a specialist, who will be ready for the extremely dynamic work and support of the multiple streams. This position includes business trips to UK, the USA, EU countries for the testing with users on site.
We seek a person with analytical skills and deep knowledge in development lifecycle and quality assurance technologies. This is remote based position.

Responsibilities:

  • Gathering of requirements
  • Identifying the Target Test Items to be evaluated by the test effort
  • Defining the appropriate tests required and any associated Test Data
  • Design and promote Quality Gates for implementation teams
  • Generate test scripts and test plans
  • Gathering and managing Test Data
  • Evaluating the outcome of each test cycle
  • Help with UAT per request

Expertise:

  • Fluent (C1) or Advanced (B2) English level
  • Bachelor University degree
  • 3+ years of experience on working as test engineer/analyst in software development/ERP implementation projects
  • Knowledge of processes and tools for effective quality assurance applicable for ERP implementation projects
  • Skills of technical document writing and reviewing
  • System integration-related technologies, protocols, SDLS, CI/CD, cloud technologies
  • Self-confident, self-motivated, looking for challenges
  • Ability to works independently and remotely.
